import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import StyledLink from "../components/StyledLink"; import styles from "../styles/Navbar.module.css"; export default function NavBar() { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState("/"); useEffect(() => { setCurrentPage(window.location.pathname); }, []); return (

  • setCurrentPage("/")} class="nav-link" href="#"> Home (current)
  • setCurrentPage("/schedule")} class="nav-link" href="#" > Schedule
  • Workouts
    setCurrentPage("/workouts/event-1")} class={ currentPage == "/workouts/event-1" ? "dropdown-item active" : "dropdown-item" } href="#" > Event 1

); }
